reviewText: I was so excited about this. I gave it to a good friend for Christmas.  It wouldn't play!!! Apparently movies come in regions and this doesn't play in the US! Not happy!!!
If you do not have a system that can play in Region 2, don't waste your money. The only way I could even watch the first video was on a lap top. Total unsat!

It is all I remember PLUS much much more that I don't.

I am very very happy I made this purchase.
All the dvds are errors and I can't play
love everything anout monty python i needed to buy a special dvd player to whatch them but worth it

I ordered this for hours upon hours upon hours upon hours of silliness and entertainment, and boy did it deliver. It only got 4 stars because it IS region 2 encoded, and as such does not work on most American-purchased DVD players.
